title: [Gameplay] Arcade hecarim no longer has a rainbow trail on 3rd E
body:
To reporduce this bug is pretty simple;
Head into a custom game and use Hecarim's E ability. 
The rainbow trail that is supposed to show up (even on max settings) does not

I really loved this skin because of that. I believe this bug has been here since 6.5's changes to hecarim's E

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This should be resolved with the next patch. :)

Dear Rito
As a fellow member of  the chaos society I took it upon myself to become a shaco main and I now have all his skins except for workshop send help.
Hello!  He should be making a return this holiday season! Patience, Summoner.~ {{champion:7}}
